title: Workshop on Designing Medical Ethics Education for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational instructional methodologies and elementary curriculum experience
context.additional_context: Learning educational design methods applying the hidden curriculum principle, centered on ethical dilemma cases pre-service teachers may encounter in elementary education settings

learning_goals: Participants can identify and analyze at least three hidden curriculum elements in medical ethics education
Participants can develop two strategies for designing ethics education activities applicable in real-world educational settings
Participants can improve the ethical validity of designed educational scenarios to meet over 85% compliance through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
